Technical issue(s): Intro sequence is choppy.

Title: Arena Football

Technical issue(s): The bottom half of the screen is not drawn correctly in split-screen mode.

Title: Bass Pro Shops Trophy Hunter 2007
Technical issue(s): The aiming reticule is surrounded by a box while the snowmobile suffers from a partial lack of collision.

Title: Big Bumpin'
Technical issue(s): Game includes Original Xbox and Xbox 360 versions on a single disc.

Title: Black Stone: Magic & Steel Ex-Chaser (JP)
Technical issue(s): Graphics for Y button do not display correctly in Controller Settings.

Title: Blade II
Technical issue(s): There is a slight pause when reaching a save point.

Title: Blinx: The Time Sweeper
Technical issue(s): This title consistently experiences slowdown.

Title: Blinx 2: Masters of Time and Space
Technical issue(s): This title experiences consistent performance problems.

Title: Blood Omen 2
Technical issue(s): Characters may spin in different directions randomly during cut scenes. When gaining a new ability graphical effects do not display correctly.

Title: BloodRayne 2
Technical issue(s): After reloading the checkpoint a noticeable loss in frame rate is present.

Title: Breakdown
Technical issue(s): During gameplay system hangs on occasion while light sources show through walls.

Title: Breeders' Cup World Thoroughbred Championships [ a ]
Technical issue(s): Video in the Start menu skips.

Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Technical issue(s): When viewing the opening logos and cinematic it will not display properly.

Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Chaos Bleeds
Burger King games [ 20 ]
Technical issue(s): See Big Bumpin', PocketBike Racer, and Sneak King entries.

Title: Burnout
Technical issue(s): During the "USA Marathon" track performance drops.

Title: Burnout 2: Point of Impact
Technical issue(s): Pressing Start on attract mode will cause the game to boot back instantly. When playing split-screen races and on tracks with snow and rain effects performance slows down.

Title: Call of Cthulhu: Dark Corners of the Earth
Technical issue(s): During the prologue stage a green dot appears and will remain on screen while walking down the last set of stairs.

Title: Call of Duty: Finest Hour
Technical issue(s): Prone to potentially game breaking freezing late in the Soviet campaign, very occasional minor texture flickering.

Title: Call of Duty 2: Big Red One
Technical issue(s): When playing multiplayer, dots representing the enemy do not appear in the HUD.

Title: Cars
Technical issue(s): When viewing cut scenes pixel color alteration will occur.

Title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch and The Wardrobe
Colin McRae Rally 04
Technical issue(s): Frametiming (fluidity) issues during racing. Slowdown during corners on some tracks. Race timer is unaffected, leading to overall increased difficulty. Playing in bumper camera resolves this. Letters and characters such as in text and menus have graphical artifacts.

Title: Colin McRae Rally 2005
Technical issue(s): While on the main menu there is some texture flickering in the background image. Before the start of a race graphical artifacts appear on text on screen. During single and multiplayer races there are severe fluidity issues, inconstant frame rate and screen tearing.

Title: Conker: Live & Reloaded
Technical issue(s): Loading screens will not appear, occasional system hangs during gameplay and local multiplayer. Effects such as dust and smoke will not render correctly. The game crashes when entering the Dung Beetle dungeon.

Title: Counter-Strike
Technical issue(s): When playing in VGA/HD video mode performance drops occur during single player mode high bot matches.

Title: Crash Bandicoot: The Wrath of Cortex
Crash Nitro Kart
Technical issue(s): Runs at 30 fps in 720p in 480p the game runs at 60fps.

Title: Crash Twinsanity
Technical issue(s): Certain sections may experience slowdown and frame rate issues. Audio may desync in cutscenes.

Title: Crime Life: Gang Wars
Technical issue(s): Random cut scenes display a static image while audio plays normally. There is an occasional crash during the loading screen.

Title: Crimson Skies: High Road to Revenge
The Da Vinci Code
Technical issue(s): There are some environments that are transparent. There is some skipping during the cut scenes.

Title: Dai Senryaku VII: Modern Military Tactics Daisenryaku VII (JP)
Technical issue(s): After the opening logos, a dirty disc error is occasionally displayed.

Title: Darkwatch
Technical issue(s): The "Invasion" mission is unplayable – trying to start it causes the game to either freeze or exit to the main interface showing an error message, making it impossible to proceed with the story. The intro sequence is choppy and skipping it makes the game freeze after pressing the Start button at the title screen.

Title: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX 2
Technical issue(s): The sky is corrupted in the Attract Mode. There is also a random performance drop during gameplay.

Title: Dead or Alive Ultimate
Technical issue(s): A random crash may occur before starting the opening movie. Slowdowns during certain stages.

Title: Dead to Rights
Technical issue(s): Flickering during third helicopter fight on mission #6. Temporary performance drops on stage #7.

Title: Destroy All Humans!
Technical issue(s): The weapon sounds cut out during periods of high activity.

Title: Digimon Rumble Arena 2
Technical issue(s): Issue only present in the Japanese version, save data title is shown in English.

Title: Dinotopia: The Sunstone Odyssey
Technical issue(s): Game subtitles and background font are showing poorly. When in mission #1 player attack on training dummy frame-rate drops during attacking.

Title: Drive to Survive Mashed: Fully Loaded (PAL)
Technical issue(s): A short pause in gameplay will occur when taunting.

Title: Dynasty Warriors 4 Shin Sangokumusou 3 (JP)
Technical issue(s): Game progress may not save correctly. Severe frame rate drops when many characters are on-screen. Minor visual artifacts on some menus.

Title: The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind
Technical issue(s): The load game screenshots will fail to render correctly.

Title: ESPN College Hoops 2K5
Technical issue(s): During the intro video, there is some choppiness.

Title: ESPN Major League Baseball
Technical issue(s): Controller sometimes fails to vibrate outside of the strike zone, logos on player uniforms sometimes flicker and occasional choppy animations when video mode is set to 1080i.

Title: ESPN NHL 2K5
Technical issue(s): There are texture issues throughout the gameplay and gameplay splash screens.

Title: Evil Dead: A Fistful of Boomstick
Evil Dead: Regeneration
Technical issue(s): Some in-game light sources engulf large portions of the screen. There is some random crashing.

Title: Fable
Technical issue(s): Occasionally there is an audio "scratch" or static popping sound.

Title: The Fairly OddParents: Breakin' da Rules
Fantastic Four
Technical issue(s): There is a random crash during the first full-motion video.

Title: Far Cry Instincts
Technical issue(s): During three-person split-screen, there is graphic distortion and loss of control. There are jagged horizontal lines in the attract mode on 480p/720p displays. Frame rate drops during the second mission, and there are visible texture seams while riding the zipline in the mines. When using a melee attack after transformation, the knife audio effect plays. The checkpoints do not save when running in PAL-50.

Title: Fatal Frame Project Zero (PAL)
Technical issue(s):
The PAL version "Project Zero" is not supported. Missing video during a ghost introduction cutscene in the mansion.
Some alpha textures on the main character's hair are broken.

Title: Fatal Frame II: Crimson Butterfly Project Zero II: Crimson Butterfly (PAL)
FIFA 06
Technical issue(s): The in-game cut scenes are blurry as well as the penalty shootouts.

Title: FIFA 07
Technical issue(s): The frame rate drops on the opening video, and the in-game cut scenes are blurry.

Title: Fight Night 2004
Technical issue(s): Has on some hairstyles problems, to display. And something it has slowdowns.

Title: Final Fight: Streetwise
Technical issue(s): The audio and video are not synced in the cut scenes while there is minor flickering in the cinematics. There is a performance slowdown during gameplay when there is a significant number of objects on screen, and the floor texture is missing in the Pier 15 area of Chapter 3.

Title: Forgotten Realms: Demon Stone
Technical issue(s): In Chapter 4, there is a texture dropout in the cut scene. In Chapters 4 and 5, the unlockable concept art videos do not play. There is a small vertical dotted line distortion on the right side of the heads-up display.

Title: Forza Motorsport
Technical issue(s): Frame rate is lower and unstable if compared to the original experience. There are some artifacts in the decals menu. Occasionally, you can hear audio noises. The loading animation does not appear, except for when high scores are being saved.

Title: Freaky Flyers
Technical issue(s): The frame rate occasionally drops during the game.

Title: Freestyle Street Soccer Urban Freestyle Soccer (PAL)
Full Spectrum Warrior: Ten Hammers
Technical issue(s): There is some improper aliasing on player models and environment.

Title: GoldenEye: Rogue Agent
Technical issue(s): The PAL version is not backwards compatible.

Title: Grabbed by the Ghoulies
Technical issue(s): Video output is too narrow on VGA with 1280x1024 resolution. This can be remedied by selecting a different output resolution. There is a chance of save data corruption when the game is booted up. Lightbulbs may show a checkerboard pattern instead of light effect.

Title: Grand Theft Auto III
Technical issue(s): There is some chugging during the intro. Major frame rate slowdown while driving. Radio is quiet during gameplay.

Title: Grand Theft Auto: Double Pack [ 34 ]
Technical issue(s): See GTA 3 and Vice City entries.

Title: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
Technical issue(s): Audio sometimes cuts out randomly during cutscenes, or sometimes audio lag. Vehicle explosions would cause it to flicker. Most notably the fire trucks.

Title: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
Technical issue(s): There is some chugging during the intro. Major frame rate slowdown while driving. Radio is quiet during gameplay.

Title: Grand Theft Auto: The Trilogy [ 37 ]
Technical issue(s): See GTA 3, Vice City, and San Andreas entries.

Title: Gravity Games Bike: Street Vert Dirt
Technical issue(s): Only works in 480p.

Title: Greg Hastings Tournament Paintball MAX'D
Technical issue(s): During system link and online gameplay, players may be randomly teleported.

Title: The Guy Game
Technical issue(s): There is audio choppiness in videos under the bonus unlockables, and on the extra videos at the end of an episode.

Title: Half-Life 2
Technical issue(s): This game does not play on PAL-60 televisions with composite cabling. This does not affect PAL-50 televisions. Screen corruption in attract mode will occur after the console has been idle for a long period of time.

Title: Halo 2
Technical issue(s): Performance problems while playing on the Backwash map. Occasionally the player may observe "ghost" images displayed on the screen. Playing the Gravemind stage in Campaign displays ghost images as well. According to Microsoft, the workaround for this issue is to return to the Dashboard and restart the game.

Title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Technical issue(s): Certain objects have no graphics while there is a frames-per-second issue.

Title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Technical issue(s): An occasional hard lock occurs when switching to cut scenes. Occasionally, enemies will become stuck in a loop or just stuck to the environment.

Title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone (PAL)
He-Man: Defender of Grayskull
Technical issue(s): An Xbox version was planned but never released, however this title is included on Microsoft's official backwards compatible list.

Title: The House of the Dead III
Technical issue(s): Slowdowns during certain sections of the game. House of the Dead 2 has severe graphical issues and huge slowdowns and sometimes speeds up randomly.

Title: I-Ninja
Technical issue(s): The frame rate drops in World 3 Central map.

Title: The Incredible Hulk: Ultimate Destruction
Technical issue(s): Flickering textures, black bars during cinematics sometimes flicker too.

Title: The Incredibles Mr. Incredible (JP)
Technical issue(s): Skyscraper textures are swapped to Mr. Incredible's textures

Title: The Incredibles: Rise of the Underminer
Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb
Technical issue(s): Some sound effects are out of sync, and there is a random crash on the last level.

Title: Jade Empire
Technical issue(s): The Monk Zeng content from the limited edition became available as of the December 2005 update.

Title: Jet Set Radio Future
Technical issue(s): There is graphical flickering in the main menu. Some particle effects in 99th street cause heavy frame drops as well as unknown frame drops in various other stages (Dogenzaka Hill, Fortified Rezidential Zone).

Title: Judge Dredd: Dredd vs. Death
Technical issue(s): Slowdowns and slightly distracting ground and wall flickering during gameplay.

Title: Justice League Heroes
Technical issue(s): Text still appears when scrolling through the upgrade menu screen. There are performance drops during game play. There are some texture issues.

Title: King Arthur
Technical issue(s): Minor video stuttering occurs during the actual movie videos.

Title: The King of Fighters 2002 & 2003
Technical issue(s): KOF 2002 shows corrupted sprite frames.

Title: Kingdom Under Fire: The Crusaders
Technical issue(s): Game hangs when selecting "Create Match" after editing a party.

Title: The Legend of Spyro: A New Beginning
Lego Star Wars: The Video Game
Lego Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy
Leisure Suit Larry: Magna Cum Laude
Technical issue(s): Incorrect textures are loaded as the player progresses.

Title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events
The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Technical issue(s): Slowdown during in game cutscenes. Gameplay is fine.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age
Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects
Marvel vs. Capcom 2: New Age of Heroes
Technical issue(s): There is some severe artifacting on character sprites.

Title: Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX 2

Title: Max Payne
Technical issue(s): The game has some minor slowdown.

Title: Max Payne 2: The Fall of Max Payne
Maximum Chase
Technical issue(s): Live action cinematics are choppy.

Title: Medal of Honor: Rising Sun
Technical issue(s): Framerate constantly drops, and when you try to save your progress after completing a mission, the game does not save despite saying "saving."

Title: Mega Man Anniversary Collection
Technical issue(s): In Mega Man 8, there are some graphical glitches where certain sprites, such as Mega Man's running sprite, glitch out and stutter. The videos that are unlockable in the game also stutter badly.

Title: Mercenaries: Playground of Destruction
Technical issue(s): The thumbnail map will not render correctly. During the China campaign, there are random system hang-ups that prevent player progress.

Title: Metal Arms: Glitch in the System
Technical issue(s): Minor frame drops occur.

Title: MLB Slugfest 2003
Technical issue(s): All resolutions above 480i / 480p show no video. There is text corruption throughout the game in the menu, gameplay, pause, and other screens.

Technical issue(s): The Press Start screen has severe flickering.

Title: Mortal Kombat: Deception
Technical issue(s): There is flickering on the title screen.

Title: MotoGP 2
Technical issue(s): Engine sound effects play louder than normal setting when at higher speeds. Engine sounds crackle and cut out during races. The option to assign keys to the Right Trigger in the Settings menu is missing. Tutorial videos shake and flash.

Title: MTV Music Generator 3: This Is the Remix
Technical issue(s): The game performs at a severely low frame-rate when on the Files menu.

Title: MTX Mototrax
Technical issue(s): The loading progress bar is missing.

Title: MX Unleashed
Technical issue(s): The shadows flicker when leaving the starting gate. Loading screens have a silver box behind the text. Distant trees flicker in and out on the Montauk Plains Freestyle stage.

Title: MX vs. ATV Unleashed
Technical issue(s): When entering or leaving a race, graphics are polarized. There is object rendering difficulty on the horizon during a waypoint race. Shadows flicker in the THQ SX championship on the Tucson track.

Title: MX World Tour Featuring Jamie Little
Namco Museum
Technical issue(s): The arrangement game dig dug arrangement found in this version of Namco Museum causes a crash immediately during gameplay. Halting player's progress the solution is to eject the game disc and restart the game

Title: NASCAR Thunder 2002
Technical issue(s): There is audio static throughout the game, and the performance drops when the rear view mirror is enabled.

Title: NASCAR Thunder 2003
Technical issue(s): Framerate is sluggish, and there is also audio static throughout the game. The audio effects are loud when in the in-car view, and there is some flickering in the Pause menu.

Title: NBA Street V3
Technical issue(s): There is audio stuttering in the introductory video.

Title: NCAA Football 06
Technical issue(s): Player speed while sprinting is very slow. During gameplay there is some audio static.

Title: NCAA March Madness 06
Technical issue(s): Performance problems occur during the intro video. There is some audio stutter during the game setup, and minor audio static occurs during gameplay.

Title: NCAA March Madness 2005
Technical issue(s): Video stutters during the introductory video.

Title: Need for Speed: Underground 2
Technical issue(s): Cutscenes stutter and lag. 2-Player Split-screen camera breaks for Player 2 and shows more of Player 1's camera, rendering split-screen play unplayable.

Title: NHL 2005
Technical issue(s): Audio and video are out of sync in the introductory cinematic.

Title: NHL 2K3
Technical issue(s): A random crash will occur at the loading screen when launching a quick game. During system link games, there are performance drops and random de-syncing between consoles. There are minor performance drops during gameplay, and after a goal is scored, an audio squeal can be heard.

Title: NHL Hitz Pro
Technical issue(s): During faceoffs and replays, there is minor flickering on the players.

Title: NightCaster
Technical issue(s): Audio dialogue ends early during the gameplay, and there is a minor performance drop during the opening and closing of the spellbook.

Title: Ninja Gaiden
Technical issue(s): The unlockable NES arcade games cannot be played.

Title: Ninja Gaiden Black
Technical issue(s): This title is rendered at a slightly reduced speed on PAL-50 televisions. The game runs normally under PAL-60. The unlockable NES arcade game can't be played.

Title: Oddworld: Munch's Oddysee
Technical issue(s): The frame rate drops during in-game cinematics, and the sound effects sound very distant.

Title: Open Season
Technical issue(s): The camera is jittery when running uphill on the Beaver Damage Stage.

Title: Outlaw Golf 9 More Holes of X-mas
Technical issue(s): Frame rate drops during gameplay.

Title: Outlaw Volleyball
Technical issue(s): Flickering background graphics occur during a match.

Title: OutRun 2
Technical issue(s): Audio loops occasionally get stuck. Graphics do not always stream in time around checkpoints. Performance drops during game play.

Title: OutRun 2006: Coast 2 Coast
Technical issue(s): The loading screen hangs for quite a long time, but eventually the game starts and plays as expected.

Title: Pac-Man World 3
Technical issue(s): Character motion can be blurry.

Title: Panzer Elite Action: Fields of Glory
Pariah
Technical issue(s): There is a minor, but recurring, drop in performance during gameplay. The Loading bar does not display until it is almost full. There is a green line in the pre-game introduction video.

Title: Phantom Crash
Technical issue(s): Audio does not work in cutscenes. The game also does not play music. Low framerate during game play.

Title: Phantom Dust
Technical issue(s): The system occasionally hangs during gameplay.

Title: Pinball Hall of Fame: The Gottlieb Collection
Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
Technical issue(s): Frame drops on larger areas when enemies are present. Unlockable mini-games do not play correctly for this title.

Title: Pro Race Driver TOCA Race Driver (PAL)
Project Gotham Racing
Technical issue(s): There are severe FPS drops on several maps.

Title: Project Gotham Racing 2
Technical issue(s): Cars don't render properly in Car Select and Transmission Select. The car radio does not work in-game.

Title: PocketBike Racer
Technical issue(s): Game includes Original Xbox and Xbox 360 versions on a single disc.

Title: Psychonauts
Technical issue(s): The game has a tendency to apply the pause menu texture to Raz's clothing upon closing it, turning it blue.

Title: RalliSport Challenge
Technical issue(s): Loading screen is visually broken. Game occasionally ignores input of the start button.

Title: Rapala Pro Fishing
Technical issue(s): The compass fails to load in certain levels, and fish can become stuck in the rocks when on the line.

Title: Red Dead Revolver
Technical issue(s): There is some graphics flicker in HD video mode, which can be resolved by switching to 480p video output. When fighting the boss "Bad Bessie", if the player gets too close to her the game will freeze. A workaround can be found on a GameFAQs forum. [ 45 ]

Title: Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Tides of War
Technical issue(s): Heavy framerate drops on some levels.

Title: Richard Burns Rally
Technical issue(s): Game play pauses during Exercise in the Rally School.

Title: RoadKill
Technical issue(s): Main Menu does not display. Press A to launch single player mode. Widescreen mode is activated, but is squished to 4:3 480p widescreen and HD resolutions. Only will switching to HD VGA modes and changing the aspect ratio to 4:3 will fix this issue.

Title: Robin Hood: Defender of the Crown
Rugby 06
Technical issue(s): There is audio stuttering during the gameplay, and players render as a dark silhouette on the right side of the field but only during the first game played.

Title: Samurai Jack: The Shadow of Aku
Technical issue(s): An Xbox version was planned but never released, however this title is included on Microsoft's official backwards compatible list.

Title: Scooby-Doo! Night of 100 Frights
Technical issue(s): Game crashes on the final boss, making it impossible to complete the game on this version.

Title: Sega GT 2002
Technical issue(s): Title plays very slowly. Occasional crashes during replays and occasional moderate frame rate drops.

Title: Sega GT Online
Technical issue(s): Performance drops too low on many levels.

Title: Shadow Ops: Red Mercury
Technical issue(s): Performance drops with poor frame-per-second rate in gameplay. PAL edition not backwards compatible.

Title: Shadow the Hedgehog
Technical issue(s): The game may occasionally or often crash during cutscenes, levels, loading screens and when skipping cutscenes. switching the console manually to 480p can make it less common. The cgi cutscenes are slowed down to 15 FPS.

Title: Shark Tale
Technical issue(s): While running at 480p in-game cinematics are choppy. A random crash will occur during the Dreamworks cinematic.

Title: Shenmue II
Technical issue(s): All shadows and most post-processing effects do not appear. Trying to switch screen filters doesn't work, only pausing the game for a moment and continuing like nothing happened. Trying to play Space Harrier and Hang-On will crash the game.

Title: Shinchou Mahjong (Nobunaga Mahjong)
Technical issue(s): A line-like graphic is displayed near the character's neck.

Title: Sid Meier's Pirates!
Technical issue(s): While sailing on the world map, there are occasional choppy animations. The German version of the game has a bug that doesn't allow dividing the plunder, making the game unbeatable. 2K never fixed the bug on Xbox or Xbox One. The game did not get sold as an Xbox Original in Germany. [ 50 ] [ 51 ]

Title: Silent Hill 2: Restless Dreams
Technical issue(s): The PAL version will only display a Black Screen. NTSC works but has numerous glitches. Textures will sometimes fail to load resulting in either completely white or see-through environments or wrongly assigned textures. The flashlight illuminates around the player instead of only in front of them. There is a save file glitch where you cannot save multiple saves on the same file. You can only overwrite the previous file or make a new one entirely otherwise the game will display a black screen the next time you start it up. The close-up screens for the puzzles will sometimes display the wrong screen.

Title: Silent Hill 4: The Room
Technical issue(s): Visible seams on NPCs' faces during cutscenes.

Title: The Simpsons: Hit & Run
Technical issue(s): Significant screen-tearing throughout (manually dropping the Xbox 360's resolution to 480p yields moderate improvements).

Title: The Simpsons: Road Rage
Technical issue(s): Missing some character voices. Noticeable on character select screen and when dropping off someone at their destination. Framerate tends to drop during game

Title: Sneak King
Technical issue(s): Game includes Original Xbox and Xbox 360 versions on a single disc.

Title: Sonic Heroes
Technical issue(s): Higher resolutions cause pixelated/jagged textures on UI elements and Some UI elements have lines on them.  Recap of pre-rendered cutscenes play their respective audio over the credits overlapping the respective teams' story mode song(Not on PAL version). Credits scroll slightly slower so they will still continue after the respective Team's Song. CGI cutscenes run at about 15FPS.

Title: Sonic Riders
Technical issue(s): Pre rendered videos on menus can easily start flickering, glitching out or not working, it usually happens when going back and forth from most menus, but it can happen by itself, videos viewed in the theatre mode can even become seizure inducing with the screen turning white every other frame. The game runs worse than on original Xbox the more players are on a race.

Title: Soulcalibur II
Technical issue(s): The controller vibration does not work.

Title: Spider-Man
Technical issue(s): Minor frame rate drops.

Title: Spider-Man 2
Technical issue(s): Textures flicker during the game.

Title: SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom
Technical issue(s): Skybox texture will sometimes glitch, showing a tesselation of random colors.

Title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
Technical issue(s): Certain textures load incorrectly in the game.

Title: Spyro: A Hero's Tail
Technical issue(s): May freeze in the middle of gameplay. Also, whilst selectable, the minigame and art View options from the menu screen will not appear, leaving you with a blank screen, which can be blindly navigated.

Title: SSX 3
Technical issue(s): This title has minor graphical glitches.

Title: Star Wars: Battlefront
Technical issue(s): In some instances, system link games may freeze. The ice cave on the "Rhen Var Harbor" map has major texture flickering.

Title: Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith
Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy
Technical issue(s): Cannot play split-screen games for this title.

Title: Star Wars: Jedi Starfighter
Technical issue(s): Minor slowdown during menu selections and transitions, minor performance issues during cut scenes. Items on HUD may randomly become solid instead of transparent.

Title: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II – The Sith Lords
Technical issue(s): Severe audio glitches: soundtrack and combat music will cut out after a series of intermittent buzzing-like sounds usually in the menu screen. Severe framerate drops during combat. Player characters will freeze in place and phase ahead instead of walking/running. Save file corruption is also a distinct possibility. The game should be played exclusively on the first generation Xbox for an optimal experience.

Title: Stubbs the Zombie in Rebel Without a Pulse
Super Monkey Ball Deluxe
Technical issue(s): The game emulates lag incorrectly, causing stages such as Warp and Speedy Jam to slow down much more than on an original Xbox. There is a serious issue where Monkey Fight DX has a serious graphical rendering issue rendering Monkey Fight DX unplayable. Monkey Soccer DX suffers from a glitch where the screen goes black with an infinite soccer ball kick sound effect playing repeatedly in a loop. On PAL systems, the subtitled speech bubbles in story mode cutscenes are out of sync. The game also takes over 2 minutes to start up.

Title: Syberia II
Technical issue(s): Game takes almost a minute to load from the Xbox splash screen. There are graphical issues when moving between screens.

Title: Taz: Wanted
Technical issue(s): During World 3, Stage 2: Haunted there is a partially mis-textured graphic. The reconnect controller screen is not displayed.

Title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Melee
Technical issue(s): The introductory video stutters.

Title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
Technical issue(s): There is a minor performance drop during gameplay. The black bars are not positioned properly at 640x480 VGA.

Title: Test Drive
Technical issue(s): There are minor performance drops and minor texture flickering during gameplay. Character voices are missing during cut scenes from stage 35 until end of game.

Title: Test Drive: Eve of Destruction Driven to Destruction (PAL)
Tetris Worlds
Technical issue(s): The opening video displays a grey screen with audio only upon starting the game.

Title: Thrillville
Technical issue(s): There is an occasional random crash during gameplay. The Pirate Raiders mini-game sometimes loads without environments. In the Event Horizon mini-game, enemy sprites are missing and are replaced by a white rectangle.

Title: Tom and Jerry in War of the Whiskers
